text: Va kofiron guftand: «Mo hargiz, na ʙa in Qur'on imon meovarem va na ʙa kitoʙhoi pes az on (Tavrot, Incil va Zaʙur)!» Agar ʙuʙini ej Rasul, on ruz, ki sitamkoronro ʙaroi hisoʙrasi ʙa pesgohi Parvardigorason nigoh dorand, har kas gunohi xud ʙa gardani digare andozad. Notavonon ʙa qudratmandon gujand: «Agar sumo nameʙuded, mo ʙa Allohu rasulas imon ovarda ʙudem»
